alert.note: Alert for Grafton; Merrimack; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 1:37PM EDT until July 21 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN SULLIVAN...SOUTH CENTRAL GRAFTON AND NORTHWESTERN MERRIMACK COUNTIES... At 137 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Newport, or 10 miles northwest of New London, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Lebanon, Franklin, New London, Plymouth, Grafton, Enfield, Canaan, Danbury, Groton, Newport, Bristol, Grantham, Andover, Cornish, Hill, Croydon, Hebron, Plainfield and Orange. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 31 and 51. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
